author: ansatz
title: 13.04 64-bit only work from recovery mode
text:
Hi,
Which catalyst drivers are you using?

I am using 13.4 (after trying the beta and having to unistall).

Currently, have to hold shift on powerup, and boot throgh recovery mode (sometimes just with resume, but now more with grub update, then resume).

Normal bootup hangs on purple screen.

I did not have any success with setting nomodeset in grub.

Any suggestions?

Also, did you get the SD-card reader working?

best
